column3: Latest;Poipet City: Police at Poipet International Border Crossing on August 14
column5: accepted 37 illegal Cambodian migrant workers sent by Thai authorities
column6: including 9 females and 2 children.------The above workers were educated and instructed by the police and then handed over to the Poipet Samchat Center Workersâ€™ Reception Team for further work.------At the same time
column7: Thai authorities continue to close the border gates
column8: which are not yet open to;  ambulances and heavy trucks are still allowed to pass.------It is claimed that some Cambodian workers continue to cross the border illegally
column9: seemingly regardless of health problems and ignoring the instructions of the authorities. ------NKD
